person.persName: George M. Pettit (Powell County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. Kentucky native. Son of Asda T. Pettit and Sarah A. Pettit. Married to Priscilla W. Wills Pettit on September 20, 1858. Father of Mary T. Pettit, William Pettit, and Lura Pettit. Resident of Montogmery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Stanton, Kentucky, in 1860. Postmaster in Stanton from 1860 to 1864.
